deregistersubscriptionprovider.name: DeregisterSubscriptionProvider
deregistersubscriptionprovider.description: Grants permission to permanently delete a subscription provider in AWS License Manager

getregisteredsubscriptionprovider.name: GetRegisteredSubscriptionProvider
getregisteredsubscriptionprovider.description: Grants permission to get a subscription provider in AWS License Manager

getservicesettings.name: GetServiceSettings
getservicesettings.description: Grants permission to get the service settings for Linux subscriptions in AWS License Manager

listlinuxsubscriptioninstances.name: ListLinuxSubscriptionInstances
listlinuxsubscriptioninstances.description: Grants permission to list all instances with Linux subscriptions in AWS License Manager

listlinuxsubscriptions.name: ListLinuxSubscriptions
listlinuxsubscriptions.description: Grants permission to list all Linux subscriptions in AWS License Manager

listregisteredsubscriptionproviders.name: ListRegisteredSubscriptionProviders
listregisteredsubscriptionproviders.description: Grants permission to list subscription providers in AWS License Manager

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a selected resource

registersubscriptionprovider.name: RegisterSubscriptionProvider
registersubscriptionprovider.description: Grants permission to create a new subscription provider in AWS License Manager

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a selected resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag a selected resource

updateservicesettings.name: UpdateServiceSettings
updateservicesettings.description: Grants permission to update the service settings for Linux subscriptions in AWS License Manager
